description: Looking to create a new family but don't know where to start? Completely randomize one here! Or choose difficulty level, type of lifespan and/or number of sims and let the randomizer do the rest.
Randomize an heir and perhaps even other sims to help out... or amp up the challenge!
Get a sim completely random or customize the options you prefer! From their age to the amount of skills they will have to try to drive to max level!
Randomize everything individually! What job should your sim do? Should they marry? Should they break up? Let the odds decide!
